claimUnstake(address).notice: Claims unstaked tokens from a validator.

lastRedelegationTime(address,address).notice: Returns the last time a staker redelegated.

redelegate(address,address,uint256).notice: Redelegates tokens from one validator to another.

requestUnstake(address,address,uint256).notice: Requests to unstake tokens from a validator.

staked(address,address,uint48).notice: Returns the amount of staked tokens for a validator.

stakerTotal(address,uint48).notice: Returns the total amount of staked tokens for a staker.

unstaking(address,uint48).notice: Returns the total unstaking amount and the amount that can be claimed.

unstakingQueueOffset(address).notice: Returns the offset of the unstaking queue for a staker.

unstakingQueueRequestByIndex(address,uin.notice: Returns the unstaking request at a specific index for a staker.

unstakingQueueRequestByTime(address,uint.notice: Returns the unstaking request at a specific time for a staker.

unstakingQueueSize(address).notice: Returns the size of the unstaking queue for a staker.

validatorTotal(address,uint48).notice: Returns the total amount of staked tokens for a validator.
